review: I purchased a new Fire TV Stick. It worked very well initially. Then, it seemed to me that it began to become extremely hot. I was issued a return authorization and a "new" unit was sent to me. There was no indication that I was receiving a Certified Refurbished Fire TV Stick. The unit that I received did not function at all. The unit presents a black and white welcome screen and that is it. I went through all of the reset procedures, multiple times, and I waited patiently for the unit to initialize. I reported the problem and I was told that I needed to contact a support person to help me. Bah! The unit is now in a box, in a closet, awaiting the day when I have the patience to hook it back up and speak on the phone with someone whom will tell me what I already know ... that the unit is broken, that it was broken when it arrived, and all of the talking on the phone with a technician is not going to change that. Someday I will purchase a NEW Fire TV Stick, someday, but not soon. I am so disappointed that I was sent someone else's problem device and that I was only made aware of the devices prior history by being invited to review some of my many, many Amazon purchases.
